title: Raptorz
author: Raptorz
content: Highest Bid will get the Domain,USDT & BUSD accepted only.*Escrow charges are extra not included in selling amount.  *Topic get locked on last bid and contacted through personal message.

comments.author: klien_br
comments.body: Quote from: Raptorz on October 14, 2022, 06:38:23 AMHighest Bid will get the Domain,USDT & BUSD accepted only.*Escrow charges are extra not included in selling amount.  *Topic get locked on last bid and contacted through personal message.Why lock the topic after last bid?Instead you can keep the deal public as your rank doesn't seem trustworthy here.

comments.author: Raptorz
comments.body: Quote from: klien_br on October 18, 2022, 02:03:24 PMQuote from: Raptorz on October 14, 2022, 06:38:23 AMHighest Bid will get the Domain,USDT & BUSD accepted only.*Escrow charges are extra not included in selling amount.  *Topic get locked on last bid and contacted through personal message.Why lock the topic after last bid?Instead you can keep the deal public as your rank doesn't seem trustworthy here. hello,its actually topic get locked after deal is done genuinely or no deal, its written wrong i cant edit it.
